body.p:
Owingsville Ky
April 14th 1862,
His Excellency
Gov B. Magoffin --
Frankfort Ky
Dear Sir --

I herewith enclose you Petition for remission of fine against Thos R. Hill. The amount and particulars of which are all fully set out in the Petition. It is signed by the Comth atty, (Mr Nesbitt,) County Judge, Clerk and Sheriff --
Your consideration of the Petition, will much oblige your friend truly --
